meta.name: Lumina Design System
meta.description: Pixel-perfect design token specification for Lumina coworking/amenity booking platform. Extracted from design_system.jpg reference.

fontFamily.mono: 'SF Mono', 'Fira Code', 'Fira Mono', Menlo, Consolas, monospace

card.transition: box-shadow 200ms ease, transform 200ms ease, border-color 200ms ease

reducedMotion.behavior: Replace all animations with opacity-only transitions of max 100ms duration

colorBlindSafe.note: Status indicators always include both color AND icon/text differentiation

buttons.mobile: Full width for primary actions, stacked vertically
buttons.tablet: Auto width, inline layout with 8px gap

cards.mobile: Single column, 16px padding, full bleed optional

navigation.mobile: Bottom tab bar, 56px height, 5 max items
navigation.desktop: Top nav bar or persistent sidebar, 260px width

tables.tablet: Horizontal scroll enabled, priority columns visible

modals.mobile: Full-screen bottom sheet, drag handle, border-radius top only
modals.desktop: Centered dialog, max-width varies by content

typography.mobile: Use mobile scale values from typography.scale
typography.desktop: Use desktop scale values from typography.scale above lg breakpoint
